description: Have you ever wondered what Bernie Sanders' father did for a living or how many times Bernie Sanders has been married?  Well, then here is the skill for you! Just ask Alexa for a fact and you'll be given a wide array of information that you never knew about the Democratic presidential candidate.
exampleInteractions: Tell me more about Bernie Sanders
I want to feel the bern
name: Bernie Geek
shortDescription: Fun and quick facts about Bernie Sanders
